title: Japan's Nikkei skids in upbeat Asia; investors eye US inflation data
description: SYDNEY, Dec 5 : Japan's Nikkei skidded on Friday, wiping out this week's gains amid an otherwise upbeat Asian performance as investors wait for a U.S. inflation reading that could sway a deeply divided Federal Reserve. European stock markets were headed for a…
